T02D1765:256b-1: ma h'a k'a la ba lim te sya n'a ma /
T02D1765:256b-3: dpal mgon po'i gtor ma zhes bya ba /
T02D1765:256b-4: dpal lcam dral la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1765:256b-5: dur khrod la sogs pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su /
T02D1765:256b-6: byang chub kyi sems sngon du btang la /
T02D1765:256b-7: bam bsgrub bam gtor ma dbul te /
T02D1765:256b-9: bdag khyad par du bya ba dang /
T02D1765:256b-10: gtor ma khyad par du bya ba dang /
T02D1765:256b-11: mgron khyad par du bya ba'o //
T02D1765:256b-12: dang po ni rang nyid skad cig la bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo bar bsgoms la /
T02D1765:256b-13: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1765:256b-14: gnyis pa ni bandha 'am thod pa'i nang du mi'i
T02D1765:256b-15: sha chen nam sha khrag gis brgyan pa'i mgon po'i
T02D1765:256b-17: de med na snod gzhan du mar gyis brgyan pa bsham mo //
T02D1765:256b-18: gtor ma bshams zin pa dang /
T02D1765:256b-19: aom sv'a bhra wa bi shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a wa bi
T02D1765:256b-20: shuddhonyaham zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod pas gtor ma
T02D1765:256b-21: mi dmigs par stong par bsgom /
T02D1765:256b-22: stong pa'i ngang las yam sngon po cig yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1765:257a-0: rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngo @257a * //
T02D1765:257a-1: skyar 'dug pa'i dbyibs gzhu bzhin nar mor 'dug pa /
T02D1765:257a-2: gzhu mchog gnyis ni mda' dar gyi ba dan gyis mtshan pa cig bsgom /
T02D1765:257a-3: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba tsha ba cig bsgom /
T02D1765:257a-4: de'i steng na aa yongs su gyur pa las thod
T02D1765:257a-5: pa shin tu yangs shing che ba cig bsam mo
T02D1765:257a-6: // de'i steng du hr'i:dkar po de las 'od zer 'phros gtor ma la mar 'phros song bas /
T02D1765:257a-7: gtor ma'i mi gtsang ba dang /
T02D1765:257a-8: snod kyi dri ma dag par bsam mo //
T02D1765:257a-9: der hr'i:yang bdud rtsir zhu bar bsam /
T02D1765:257a-10: de nas gtor ma bas khru gang gis mtho ba'i
T02D1765:257a-11: steng du ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D1765:257a-12: du h'um mthing nag de yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1765:257a-13: rdo rje nag po rtse dgu pa khong seng can
T02D1765:257a-14: cig bsam / de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1765:257a-15: de'i steng du h'um mthing nag cig bzhengs nas bzhugs par bsam /
T02D1765:257a-16: h'um las 'od zer 'phros nas rdo rje khong seng nas song /
T02D1765:257a-17: rdo rje'i ra 'og ma nas gnyis su gyes nas song bas /
T02D1765:257a-18: gzhu mchog gnyis kyis ba dan la brgyab pas /
T02D1765:257a-19: ba dan gyis rlung g-yab pas rlung gis me sbar mes thod pa khol /
T02D1765:257a-21: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin
T02D1765:257a-22: gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi
T02D1765:257a-23: rnam pa lnga char 'bab par bsams la /
T02D1765:257a-24: ngag tu aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a
T02D1765:257a-25: n'am a'adya nu tpannta tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um phat sv'a
T02D1765:257a-26: h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags lan lnga'am bdun brjod /
T02D1765:257a-27: a'a h'um dang de bzhin brjod rdo rje'i steng gi nyi ma dang /
T02D1765:257a-28: 'og gi nyi ma gnyis h'um dang gsum 'khyag pa'i
T02D1765:257a-29: zar bu zhu ba gtsug tu bdud rtsir zhu bar
T02D1765:257a-30: bsams la / de nas rang gi lag pas rdo
T02D1765:257a-31: rje blangs nas lan gsum dkrugs pas bdud rtsi dkar
T02D1765:257a-33: de nas rang gi lag pa'i rdo rje mi dmigs par bsgom mo //
T02D1765:257a-34: de ni gtor ma khyad par du bya ba'o //
T02D1765:257a-35: mgron khyad par du bya ba ni gtor ma'i mdun
T02D1765:257a-36: gyi nam mkha' la ram yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1765:257a-38: de'i steng du h'um mthing nag cig bsam /
T02D1765:257a-39: de las 'od 'phros sems can thams cad la phog
T02D1765:257a-40: / sdig sgrib dag / thams cad dpal mgon po'i
T02D1765:257a-41: skur gyur / de slar 'dus pas dpal mgon po
T02D1765:257b-0: sku @257b mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D1765:257b-1: g-yas g-yon na mi shes pa gcod pa'i ral gri
T02D1765:257b-2: dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa /
T02D1765:257b-3: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1765:257b-4: mche ba gtsigs pa mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal
T02D1765:257b-5: dang stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can cig bsam
T02D1765:257b-6: / de'i thugs kar ram yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1765:257b-7: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng na h'um mthing nag
T02D1765:257b-8: las g-yas su phat dmar nag cig chad song ba
T02D1765:257b-9: las nyi ma'i gdan la dpal legs ldan nag po
T02D1765:257b-10: sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D1765:257b-11: g-yas g-yon na tsandan gyi be co na dang thod pa khrag gis gang ba bsnams pa /
T02D1765:257b-12: zhabs g-yon pa cung zad brkyang ba /
T02D1765:257b-13: g-yas pa cung zad bskum pa'i 'gying bag can /
T02D1765:257b-14: rus pa'i ze phrog can 'jol ber sum brtsegs g-yel
T02D1765:257b-15: ba gser gyi ska rags bcings pa cig tu bsgom
T02D1765:257b-16: mo // de nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1765:257b-17: ri rab kyi byang phyogs kyi bad rim nas mgon po dpon g-yog spyan drangs la /
T02D1765:257b-19: dpal legs ldan la yang de bzhin du bstim mo //
T02D1765:257b-20: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1765:257b-21: yang mgon po'i g-yon phyogs su yam sngo skya yongs su gyur pa las ;
T02D1765:257b-23: de'i steng na bhyo:smug nag de las 'od 'phros sems
T02D1765:257b-24: can la phog sdig sgrib dag thams cad dpal lha
T02D1765:257b-25: mo'i skur slar 'dus pas dpal lha mo sku mdog
T02D1765:257b-26: smug nag bong bu ga dmar la bcibs pa zhal
T02D1765:257b-28: g-yas g-yon na ral gri dang thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa /
T02D1765:257b-30: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brjes pa /
T02D1765:257b-32: gong smed gong thag sbrul las byas pa /
T02D1765:257b-33: snga sha phyi sha la mi ro btags pa /
T02D1765:257b-35: mtshon gyi dru du thogs pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D1765:257b-36: 'de'i thugs ka nas ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1765:257b-37: de'i steng na bhyo:smug nag de las g-yon phyogs su bhyo:nag po cig chad song ba /
T02D1765:257b-38: dpal re ma ti sku mdog nag mo re ba'i
T02D1765:257b-39: gos gyon pa dre'u nag po la chibs pa zhal
T02D1765:257b-40: gcig phyag gnyis ma g-yas g-yon na ral gri dang
T02D1765:258a-2: gong smed gong thag sbrul las byas pa /
T02D1765:258a-3: snga sha phyi sha la mi ro btags pa /
T02D1765:258a-4: nad kyi rkyal bu dang mtshon gyi dru gu thogs pa cig tu bsgom mo //
T02D1765:258a-5: de nas rang gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros song bas /
T02D1765:258a-6: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
T02D1765:258a-7: bzangs [*pa zangs?] kyi byang shar mtshams kyi mtsho mu
T02D1765:258a-8: le ldings nas ye shes kyi lha mo 'khor bcas
T02D1765:258a-9: spyan drangs la / dza:h'um bam ho:sa bstim mo //
T02D1765:258a-10: lha mo drel zhon ma la yang de bzhin du bstim mo //
T02D1765:258a-11: de nas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab po //
T02D1765:258a-12: de nas bzlas pa byed na /
T02D1765:258a-13: rang gi snying gnas ram yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1765:258a-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na h'um mthing nag
T02D1765:258a-16: aom tsanda ma h'a k'a la badzra dam shti na
T02D1765:258a-17: h'um h'um h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis g-yas
T02D1765:258a-18: skor nas yod par bsams la /
T02D1765:258a-19: de rang gi kha nas thon mgon po'i zhal du song /
T02D1765:258a-20: lte ba nas thon rang gi lte bar yang rang
T02D1765:258a-21: gi kha nas thon mgon po'i zhal du de bzhin
T02D1765:258a-22: du khor yug tu 'khor bar bsams shing bzlas par
T02D1765:258a-23: bya'o // dpal lha mo'i zlas pa byed na khor
T02D1765:258a-24: yug gi bzlas pa mi bya bar dpal lha mo
T02D1765:258a-25: bya'o // la dmigs la / aom ro ru ro
T02D1765:258a-26: ru tri tsa pa la aa shug me ma h'um
T02D1765:258a-27: bhyo:dzdza:dzdza:zhes bya ba'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1765:258a-28: bzlas pa mi byed par gtor ma btang na /
T02D1765:258a-29: bskyed pa bzhi po la mi dmigs te lce'i steng du h'um re yang btab po //
T02D1765:258a-30: h'um bzhi po de yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1765:258a-31: lce stod rdo rje smad sbu gur yod par bsams la /
T02D1765:258a-32: mgon po la stobs na h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02D1765:258a-33: gtor ma la dar btsugs nas gsol bar bsams la /
T02D1765:258a-34: h'um aom tsanda ma h'a k'a la kha kha ba
T02D1765:258a-35: lim ta kh'a hi zhes bya ba lan gsum gyis
T02D1765:258a-36: bstabs so // aom tsanda de ba ma h'a k'a
T02D1765:258a-37: la ba lim kh'a hi kh'a hi zhes bya ba
T02D1765:258a-38: lan gsum gyis lha mo dpon g-yog la bstabs so
T02D1765:258a-39: bstabs so // // de nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po //
T02D1765:258a-40: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D1765:258a-41: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D1765:258a-42: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D1765:258a-43: slar yang sems can don la gshegs //
T02D1765:258a-44: aom a'a:h'um mu:zhes bya bas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs /
T02D1765:258a-45: bskyed pa bzhi po mi dmigs par bsgom /
T02D1765:258b-0: gtor ma @258b sa gtsang sar bskyal lo //
T02D1765:258b-1: d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa /
T02D1765:258b-2: lo ts'a ba 'brom ston gyis bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1765:258b-3: aom shr'i ma h'a k'a la tri yam dza /
T02D1765:258b-4: aom trag rag sha ma'i thun bhyo ma h'a yag sha tri na nag mo thun bhyo /
